_header: This solemn feast to be had in remembrance
_description: The Digby Play of the Slaughter of the Innocents — 566 lines generally in eight-line stanzas

BodDig133.First Lines:
This solenne ffest to be had in remembraunceOf blissed seynt Anne
                    moder to our lady…
BodDig133.Last Lines:
…Also þe menstralles doth your diligensA fore our
                    departyng geve vs a daunce
BodDig133.Attributed Title:
Candelmes day & the kyllynge of þe children of Israell. Anno
                    Domini 1512 the vii booke (f. 146)
